text: unhonne kahaah he saaleh! hamaare beech isase pahale tujhase badee aasha thee, kya too hamen is baat se rok raha hai ki ham usakee pooja karen, jisakee pooja hamaare baap-daada karate rahe? too jis cheez (ekeshvaravaad) kee or bula raha hai, vaastav mein, usake baare mein hamen sandeh hai, jisamen hamen dvidha hai
